comments.body: Do we really need to include the `.DS_Store` in here? Feels like nasty to add OS-specific files here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +97,101 @@# List of patterns, relative to source directory, that match files and
# directories to ignore when looking for source files.
exclude_patterns = ['_build', '.DS_Store', '**.ipynb_checkpoints']

# The reST default role (used for this markup: `text`) to use for all

comments.body: `autosummary` generates RST files but don't remove it back. Here we always remove the generated RST files so the leftover doesn't cause any side effect.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@# generating whole docs.
shutil.rmtree(
    "%s/reference/api" % os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), ignore_errors=True)
try:
    os.mkdir("%s/reference/api" % os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)))
